column4: im having an issue, when i connect with VPN it works for my internet browser but when my irssi can't connect, always saying timed out.
there should be a setting in network manager that tells ubuntu not to route everything through the VPN connection
errrm how can i tell LOL
how did you set up the VPN connection?
using ubuntu 11.04, the two arrows on my top panel
then i went to VPN connections>Configure VPN
go to VPN Connections > Configure VPN, then click on the IPv4 tab
will this allow me to use my VPN on irssi?
what's probably happening is that Ubuntu is routing all internet traffic through your VPN connection (which may be blocking irssi)
okay, after automatic vpn, address only now what
I'm leaving in a sec, but keep asking in the channel so others can help
i got " Irssi: Unable to connect server irc.freenode.net port 6667 [Name or service not known]" when i try to connect
is the VPN your only means of connecting to the Internet?
i still can't seem to get it working, i just tried irssi -c irc.freenode.net -p 6667 and it just sat there saying connecting forever.
